TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Suncen-kanpu, title = Suncen-kanpu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suncen-kanpu} }

S.FORM: pitu a seci, Suncen-kanpu palecaden tu Cincen buyuan, patideng tu Tulu-dikuo. kunyun caycay , caytu a seci, hamawsa malingatu ku Cencu a binacadan. Cencu nakamuan u Cenyi, milecad tu Cenwen. angangan nu kakawawan u sapahutin tu katala, sakayliwmah. Palutatengaan nuheni a lisin u mipaypaya, micidek ku sasinzaan nuheni.

pito a seci, Soncen-kanpo palecaden to Cincen boyoan, patideng to Tolo-dikoo. konyon caycay , cayto a seci, hamawsa malingato ko Cenco a binacadan. Cenco nakamoan o Cenyi, milecad to Cenwen. angangan no kakawawan o sapahotin to katala, sakayliwmah. Palotatengaan noheni a lisin o mipaypaya, micidek ko sasinzaan noheni.
